definition: in other words/that is to say/so/thus
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: In other words, "turtle" and wife must be unchaste .
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，“龟”的老婆一定是不贞洁的。

sentences.english: In other words, Liu's ancestors may be willing to belong to the Xiongnu tribe.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，刘仁愿的祖上有可能属于匈奴族。

sentences.english: This is when you start laying the foundation for what comes next.
sentences.chinese: 这也就是说你该开始为以后打基础了。

sentences.english: That is, he was speaking Chinglish.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，他在说中式英语。

sentences.english: The coding procedure can be repeated up to 4 times for additional remotes.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序可以进行4次，也就是说可以配4个遥控器。

sentences.english: So you say the outside door was closed when you got here ?
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，当你到这儿的时候，外面的门是锁着的。

sentences.english: That’s right, you can be open-minded and think that others are wrong.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，你可以是敞开心扉地认为其他人是错误的。

sentences.english: In other words, OFHEO wasn't just regulating Fannie Mae, it was out to get Fannie Mae.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，督察局不仅要规范房利美，还要摧毁它。

sentences.english: You cannot use CATALOG to catalog a file that belongs to a different dat abase.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说你至少还需要原数据库的控制文件。

sentences.english: In other words, it's not just the information that goes in.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，重要的不仅仅是获得了什么信息。

sentences.english: That said, there's nothing wrong with aggressive self-promotion.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，积极的自我推销是没有错的。

sentences.english: That is to say, we lie to develop level disparately.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，我们处在截然不同的发展阶段。

sentences.english: The only problem is that it's fragile and brittle, and that means it breaks easily.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的毛病在于它脆弱而易碎，也就是说很容易坏掉。

sentences.english: That is to say it is confined to the atom.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说电子会被束缚在原子内。

sentences.english: In another word, Jesus got the abandon that we deserved.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，耶稣承担了我们当得的离弃。

sentences.english: That is to say, it's a wonderful axis of combination that you're looking at.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，你所看到的是一条了不起的组合轴。
